p: Among 6,688,231 individuals who received COVID-19 vaccination, 55 deaths were reported as of January 8, 2021. The mortality rate of COVID-19 vaccination was 8.2 per million population ( Table 1). A total of 37 deaths were reported in long-term care facilities when 693,246 residents are vaccinated. The COVID-19 vaccination mortality rate was 53.4 per million population among long-term care facility residents.
